name: 2-4 hours at room temperature
definition: A specimen that has been subjected to and adjusted to the average ambient temperature of a room, usually considered to be around 20 degrees C (68 degrees F).

name: 2-24 hours at -20°C then -80°C
definition: A sample temperature result is a quality quantification facet that quantifies the temperature of the sample. [Allotrope]

name: other
definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
